home.home_about_text_1: ¡Discover the authentic San Telmo experience at Bill and Bill Hostel!
home.home_about_text_2: Our hostel is situated in the heart of San Telmo, the ideal starting point for your journey in the Argentine capital.
home.home_about_text_3: Our friendly staff will welcome you with open arms, ensuring that you feel at home from the moment you arrive.
home.home_about_text_4: We take pride in creating a warm and laid-back atmosphere where travelers from around the globe can connect and share experiences.
home.home_services_text_1: Dirigido a: Instituciones médicas, médicos y pacientes para primera o segunda opinión. Estudios realizados en otros centros de diagnóstico.

services.text_1: With our telediagnosis service, Dr. María Levin provides remote study reports and diagnoses. Efficiency and precision are essential to provide fast, quality support to healthcare professionals.
services.text_2: We offer advanced MRI services to obtain detailed images of internal structures. Our highly trained team ensures accurate studies and detailed analyzes to support the medical diagnosis.
services.text_3: We perform high-quality computed tomography studies to obtain detailed images of organs and tissues. Our accurate and reliable reports contribute to accurate diagnosis and proper treatment plan.

about.text_1: Graduated from the UBA Faculty of Medicine in 1975, with a first specialization in Nuclear Medicine - the theoretical part studied at the CONEA Heavy Water facilities in Ezeiza, the practical part as a rotation in the Nuclear Medicine Service of the Roffo Hospital. In 1980 I won a scholarship from the General Electric company to study Computed Tomography in San Francisco, California, USA and during those months I also studied Magnetic Resonance in South San Francisco, with Dr. León Kaufman who was developing a prototype. Between 1981 and 1986 I worked in a private clinic in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil in charge of Neuroimaging, especially Tomography of the brain and spine. From 1989 to 2002 I worked in Magnetic Resonance with Dr Alberto Eurnekián at the San Martín de Tours clinic and Argerich Hospital (Outsourced Service). Since 1995 to date, I have been in charge of the Computed Tomography Service at the Santojanni Hospital, where I carry out the practical part and also teach since in this hospital (attached to UBA) the Medicine Course is taught from the First Year. I was also a teacher at UNSAM between 2000 and 2022 for the Technique in Diagnostic Imaging. Buenos Aires, September 18, 2023
